stringr
  • Home

  • News

Sample character vectors for practicing string manipulations.

fruit and word come from the rcorpora package written by Gabor Csardi; the data was collected by Darius Kazemi and made available at https://github.com/dariusk/corpora. sentences is a collection of "Harvard sentences" used for standardised testing of voice.

sentences

fruit

words

Format

A character vector.

Examples

length(sentences)


[1] 720



sentences[1:5]


[1] "The birch canoe slid on the smooth planks."  "Glue the sheet to the dark blue background."
[3] "It's easy to tell the depth of a well."      "These days a chicken leg is a rare dish."   
[5] "Rice is often served in round bowls."       




length(fruit)


[1] 80



fruit[1:5]


[1] "apple"       "apricot"     "avocado"     "banana"      "bell pepper"




length(words)


[1] 980



words[1:5]


[1] "a"        "able"     "about"    "absolute" "accept"
